Package com.google.gwt.language.client.transliteration.control

Classes for working with transliteration controls.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
TextElementOptions The optional argument supplies the options that are applied for this set of textfields.
TransliterationControl Wrapper for google.elements.transliteration.TransliterationControl JS class.
TransliterationControlOptions Wrapper for Options object.
TransliterationEventDetail The transliteration event object that is given to the event listener when a registered event is triggered.
TransliterationEventListener Listener of transliteration events.
 

Enum Summary
EventType Wrapper for underlying JS EventType enum.
